text:
Hi, I'm Jeffery Self, and
I'm at the premiere party

of season two, "Search Party,"
brought to you by TBS and JBL.

It is one of the most
interesting, exciting,

mysterious parties
I've ever been to.
You haven't been inside.
Let's go inside.
[MUSIC PLAYING]
This is truly terrifying!
[MUSIC PLAYING]

As you can tell, the whole point
of this party is to explore.

To go through the
emotions, and the tones,

and the excitement
of "Search Party."
[MUSIC PLAYING]

So that's the experience
we're dealing with here

at the premier of
"Search Party," season

two, with the music and the
sounds of "Search Party"

blasting through the speakers,
and don't forget to watch

the new season of "Search
Party," premiering Sunday,

November 19th on
TBS and the TBS app.
Brought to you by JBL.
